courseDetails.title: Java en 13 Días con Aplicaciones del Mundo Real
courseDetails.shortDescription: Curso 100% Práctico - Java, Spring Boot, Swing, Java FX, Thymeleaf, PrimeFaces, FullStack con Angular, React y Spring
courseDetails.longDescription:
Este es un curso nuevo y 100% práctico!

¿Quieres Aprender Java en sólo 13 días, creando aplicaciones del Mundo Real y explicaciones paso a paso?

¿Quieres aprender la integración de tecnologías más populares de Java como son:  Aplicaciones de Escritorio con Swing, Java FX y Spring Boot, Aplicaciones Web con JSPs, Thymeleaf, JSF-PrimeFaces y Spring Boot,, Aplicaciones Fullstack con Angular, React y Spring Boot?

En este nuevo curso de Global Mentoring, aprenderás Java de la manera más práctica y divertida posible. Crearemos una aplicación del mundo real por día aplicando las tecnologías más populares de Java al día de hoy.

Este es un curso 100% práctico. Veamos cada una de las aplicaciones por día que crearemos:

Día 1: Aplicación de Calculadora

  • Aplicaremos desde los conceptos más fundamentales de Java, tales como creación de nuestro primer programa, creación de variables, operadores, sentencias de decisión, ciclos, funciones, manejo de la consola para entrada y salida de datos y muchos temas más!

Día 2: Listado de Personas

  • Aplicaremos el concepto de Clases y Objetos, uso de Listas, entre muchos temas ya aplicados en el día anterior y así reforzar cada concepto estudiando hasta el momento.

Día 3: Venta de Computadoras

  • Crearemos una aplicación de Venta de Computadoras basado en un diagrama de Clases de UML, creando clases, objetos, así como la relación entre clases y muchos temas más.

Día 4: Catálogo de Películas

  • Aprenderemos el uso de archivos en Java, manejo de Excepciones, Clases, Objetos, entre muchos temas más para resolver esta aplicación.

Día 5: Sistema de Estudiantes con Mysql

  • Para crear este sistema nos conectaremos a una Base de Datos con Mysql para realizar las tareas de Selección, Inserción, Modificación y Eliminación de registros del Sistema de Estudiantes.

Día 6: Sistema de Estudiantes con Spring Boot y Mysql

  • Este es el mismo sistema del día anterior, pero en lugar de crear las clases de nuestra aplicación manualmente, utilizaremos Spring Boot y Maven para agilizar el desarrollo de nuestra aplicación de Sistema de Estudiantes.

Día 7: Tienda de Libros con Swing y Spring Boot

  • Crearemos una Aplicación de Tienda de Libros, en esta aplicación integraremos las tecnologías de Swing y Spring Boot para crear una aplicación de Escritorio robusta y flexible para que pueda crecer todo lo que necesitemos.

Día 8: Sistema de Tareas con Java FX y Spring Boot

  • En este día crearemos un Sistema de Tareas integrando las tecnologías de Java FX y Spring Boot. Además aplicaremos el patrón de diseño MVC (Model-View-Controller), Factory, Service, DAO (Repository), etc. Este tipo de integraciones nos permitirán crear aplicaciones de Escritorio robustas y escalables tanto como necesitemos.

Día 9: Sistema de Empleados con JSPs, Spring Boot y Bootstrap

  • En este día creación nuestra primera aplicación Web para crear un Sistema de Empleados, utilizando patrones de diseño como el MVC, aplicaremos la tecnología de JSPs en la capa de presentación, patrones de diseño como Service, DAO (Repository), desplegaremos la aplicación en un servidor Tomcat Embebido, entre varias tecnologías más.

Día 10: Sistema de Agenda de Contactos con Thymeleaf y Spring Boot

  • En este día crearemos un Sistema de Agenda de Contactos, donde integraremos las tecnologías de Thymeleaf en la capa de presentación, y aplicaremos el patrón de diseño MVC, Service, Repository, entre varios más con Spring Boot.

Día 11: Sistema de Manejo de Cuentas Bancarias con PrimeFaces y Spring Boot

  • En este día crearemos un Sisteam de Manejo de Cuentas Bancarias donde integraremos las tecnologías de PrimeFaces (JSF), Spring Boot, y para facilitar la configuración de esta integración de tecnologías, utilizaremos el proyecto de JoinFaces. Este tipo de integraciones nos permite crear potentes aplicaciones Web, robustas y escalables, tanto como nuestra aplicación Web lo demande.

Día 12: Sistema Manejo de Inventarios - Fullstack con Angular y Spring Boot

  • En este día crearemos un sistema para el Manejo de Inventarios de tipo FullStack, por un lado Angular creamos nuestro Front End, desarrollado con Visual Studio Code, y por otro lado Spring Boot en el Back End, usando IntelliJ IDEA y MySql como Base de Datos. Este tipo de aplicaciones son de las más utilizadas hoy en día por las empresas.

Día 13: Sistema Administración de Recursos Humanos - Fullstack con React JS y Spring Boot

  • En este último día crearemos un Sistema de Administración de Recursos Humanos de tipo FullStack, utlizando React JS para crear el Front End, desarrollado con Visual Studio Code, y por otro lado Spring Boot en el Back End, usando IntelliJ IDEA y MySql como Base de Datos. Este tipo de aplicaciones son de las más utilizadas y demandadas hoy en día por las empresas, así que tener este tipo de conocimientos y experiencia nos garantiza abrirnos las puertas para oportunidades laborales del mundo Java.

Como puedes ver, este es un curso completísimo, donde comenzamos desde conceptos básicos y llegamos a integrar las tecnologías más populares de Java al día de hoy.

Así que no esperes más y empieza a aprender Java hoy mismo de la forma más práctica y divertida posible.

Te veo del otro lado,

You will know about: what is coaching, its types, components, rules; skills and competencies of coaches, how to proceed a coaching session and coaching methods and tools. After finishing a course you will get: key knowledge about coaching and how to implement it in effective ways


The Crucial Role of Coaching Techniques in Managerial Leadership and Career Development

The role of a manager goes far beyond traditional tasks of overseeing operations and ensuring productivity. A successful manager is now expected to act as a leader, a mentor, and a coach, guiding their team members towards individual and collective success. This paradigm shift highlights the significance of coaching techniques in the realm of managerial responsibilities.


The Transformation of Managerial Roles

Evolving Leadership Expectations

The traditional image of a manager as a stern authority figure has given way to a more holistic view of leadership. Managers are now expected to serve as role models, motivators, and mentors to their teams. This shift stems from the recognition that employees perform at their best when they feel valued, supported, and empowered.

The evolution of leadership expectations can be traced back to the changing dynamics of the modern workplace. In the past, managers were primarily responsible for enforcing rules and ensuring productivity. However, as organizations began to realize that employee engagement and satisfaction were crucial for success, a transformation in managerial roles ensued.

Today, managers are not just tasked with overseeing tasks and projects; they are expected to inspire and empower their teams. This shift is partly a response to the changing nature of work itself. In a knowledge-based economy, where creativity, innovation, and adaptability are paramount, traditional top-down management no longer suffices.


Coaching as a Leadership Skill

Coaching has emerged as a pivotal leadership skill that fosters personal and professional growth. We'll explore how coaching techniques, such as active listening, constructive feedback, and goal-setting, can empower managers to become effective leaders who inspire and guide their teams towards excellence.

Coaching is not a one-size-fits-all approach; it is a dynamic and personalized method of leadership. Effective coaches adapt their style to the needs and preferences of individual team members. They actively listen to understand the unique challenges and aspirations of each employee, fostering a sense of trust and rapport.

Moreover, coaching is not merely about providing solutions but guiding employees to discover answers themselves. This approach instills a sense of ownership and accountability in team members. It encourages them to take the initiative, think critically, and develop problem-solving skills—a valuable asset in today's fast-paced, ever-changing business landscape.

Coaching also plays a crucial role in setting and achieving goals. Effective managers use coaching techniques to collaboratively define clear, actionable objectives with their team members. This process not only aligns individual efforts with organizational goals but also empowers employees to track their progress and make necessary adjustments along the way.


Coaching Knowledge for Career Development

Career Development in the Modern Workplace

Career development is a top priority for employees. Discover how coaching knowledge equips managers with the tools to help team members navigate their career paths, set meaningful goals, and continually improve their skills.

Career development has evolved from being a peripheral concern to a central focus in the modern workplace. In an era marked by rapid technological advancements and industry disruptions, employees recognize the importance of continuous learning and skill enhancement to remain relevant and competitive.

This heightened emphasis on career development places managers at the forefront of helping their team members chart their professional journeys. Coaching knowledge equips managers with the ability to provide guidance that is not only aligned with the organization's needs but also tailored to the aspirations of individual employees.

One of the key advantages of coaching in career development is its ability to facilitate self-awareness. Effective coaches help employees identify their strengths, weaknesses, interests, and values. Armed with this self-knowledge, employees can make informed career decisions that align with their passions and long-term goals.


The Manager as a Career Development Partner

Explore the responsibilities of middle and top managers in preparing and mentoring personal development plans for their team members. Learn how these plans can align with organizational objectives and create a win-win situation for both employees and the company.

Managers who actively engage in career development become indispensable partners in their employees' professional growth. They play a pivotal role in creating personalized development plans that leverage individual strengths and address areas needing improvement.

These development plans not only benefit the employees but also the organization. By aligning individual development goals with the company's strategic objectives, managers ensure that every team member's growth contributes to the overall success of the business.

Furthermore, coaching techniques are instrumental in fostering a growth mindset within teams. Managers can use coaching to encourage employees to embrace challenges, persist in the face of setbacks, and view failures as opportunities for learning and improvement. This mindset shift has a profound impact on team performance and innovation.


Coaching for Internal Education and Employee Development

The Role of Managers in Internal Education

Managers often bear the responsibility of nurturing a culture of learning within their teams and organizations. Explore how coaching methods can be instrumental in identifying and addressing skill gaps, fostering innovation, and supporting ongoing employee development.

Organizations that prioritize learning and development gain a competitive edge. Managers are at the forefront of this initiative, serving as the catalysts for continuous improvement and innovation within their teams.

Coaching methods play a pivotal role in identifying and addressing skill gaps. By regularly assessing the competencies of their team members, managers can tailor training and development programs to bridge these gaps effectively. This proactive approach not only enhances individual skills but also bolsters the organization's overall capabilities.

Moreover, coaching encourages a culture of innovation. Effective coaches inspire creativity and critical thinking in their teams. They challenge employees to question the status quo, explore new ideas, and experiment with novel approaches. In this way, managers act as innovation champions, driving progress and adaptability.


Coaching as a Tool for Employee Empowerment

Employee empowerment is a cornerstone of effective leadership. Coaching techniques provide managers with the tools to empower their team members by fostering a sense of ownership and autonomy in their roles.

One of the primary ways coaching empowers employees is by promoting self-directed learning. Instead of relying solely on formal training programs, employees learn to identify their development needs and take initiative in seeking resources and opportunities for growth. Managers who coach effectively encourage this proactive approach.

Furthermore, coaching cultivates a growth-oriented mindset among employees. When team members receive regular feedback, both positive and constructive, they become more receptive to continuous improvement. They view challenges as opportunities for growth and development, which ultimately leads to higher levels of engagement and performance.

By creating an environment where continuous learning is celebrated, managers inspire their teams to thrive in an ever-changing business landscape. This culture of learning becomes a strategic advantage for organizations, as it enables them to adapt quickly to new challenges and opportunities.


Coaching for Mental Health and Well-being

The Manager as a Trusted Support System

For many employees, especially those who live alone or lack a strong support network, a manager can become their most trusted confidant. Understand how coaching methods extend beyond professional development to support the mental health and well-being of team members.

The relationship between a manager and their team members extends beyond the confines of the workplace. In some cases, a manager may be the primary source of support for an employee, especially when they are facing personal challenges or seeking guidance related to their mental health and well-being.

Coaching methods are not limited to career development; they encompass the whole spectrum of an employee's life. Effective managers create an environment where team members feel comfortable discussing personal challenges and seeking guidance when needed. This trust and openness are essential for maintaining employee well-being.

In situations where employees are dealing with stress, anxiety, or other mental health issues, managers with coaching skills can provide valuable support. They can listen empathetically, offer guidance on stress management techniques, and help employees access appropriate resources for professional help when necessary.


Coaching for Life Questions and Personal Challenges

Life is filled with complexities, and employees often grapple with personal challenges that can affect their work performance and overall well-being. Managers who are skilled in coaching can offer valuable guidance during these times of need.

One area where coaching is particularly beneficial is work-life balance. In today's fast-paced world, employees often struggle to juggle their professional and personal responsibilities. Managers can use coaching techniques to help team members set boundaries, manage their time effectively, and achieve a healthier work-life balance.

Coaching also proves invaluable in navigating interpersonal relationships, both within and outside the workplace. Managers can offer insights into effective communication, conflict resolution, and building positive relationships, which can significantly impact an employee's overall quality of life.

In times of personal crisis or uncertainty, such as major life transitions or unexpected challenges, employees may turn to their managers for guidance. Managers trained in coaching can provide a supportive and non-judgmental space for employees to explore their feelings, identify potential solutions, and develop action plans to address these challenges.


In conclusion, coaching techniques have become indispensable in the modern workplace, particularly within the roles of managers and leaders. These skills not only drive career development and internal education but also play a crucial role in supporting the mental health and well-being of employees.

As we navigate an ever-changing professional landscape, organizations that recognize the importance of coaching will not only foster a culture of continuous improvement but also cultivate a loyal and motivated workforce. Managers who embrace coaching as a core aspect of their leadership style will not only elevate their own careers but also become catalysts for the success of their teams and organizations as a whole.

By understanding and implementing coaching techniques effectively, managers can truly transform the workplace into an environment where individuals thrive, careers flourish, and holistic well-being is nurtured.

courseDetails.title: Professional Diploma of Mortgage and Lending Broker
courseDetails.shortDescription: How to build your business in finance, mortgage, lending brokering / broking / brokerage.  How to become the broker.
courseDetails.longDescription:
Welcome to course: Professional Diploma of Mortgage and Lending Broker by MTF Institute


In that introductional course we will speak about launching of brokering business, about banking pricing, about banking business model and how you may build the partnership with bank. Based on your feedback we will extend that course.


Course provided by MTF Institute of Management, Technology and Finance

MTF is the global educational and research institute with HQ at Lisbon, Portugal, focused on business & professional hybrid (on-campus and online) education at areas: Business & Administration, Science & Technology, Banking & Finance.

MTF R&D center focused on research activities at areas: Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, Data Science, Big Data, WEB3, Blockchain, Cryptocurrency & Digital Assets, Metaverses, Digital Transformation, Fintech, Electronic Commerce, Internet of Things.

MTF is the official partner of: IBM, Intel, Microsoft, member of the Portuguese Chamber of Commerce and Industry.

MTF is present in 208 countries and has been chosen by more than 400 000 students.


Role of Mortgage and Lending Brokers

  • Intermediary: Brokers act as the bridge between individuals/businesses seeking loans and the financial institutions that provide them.

  • Consultants and Educators: Brokers guide clients through the complicated world of mortgages and loans, explaining different options and their suitability.

  • Advocates: Brokers work to secure the best possible interest rates and terms for their clients, often negotiating on their behalf.


Typical Functions

  1. Assessing Client Needs: Brokers analyze a borrower's financial situation, goals, and credit history.

  2. Finding Suitable Lenders: They tap into their network of lenders to match the borrower with institutions that fit their profile.

  3. Comparing Options: Brokers present a range of loan products, explaining interest rates, terms, and fees of each.

  4. Application Assistance: They help clients gather paperwork and complete the loan application process.

  5. Underwriting Support: Brokers often act as liaisons between borrowers and lenders during the underwriting (approval) phase.


Why Launching a Business in Broking is a Great Idea

  • Strong Market Demand: The mortgage and lending market is complex and constantly evolving, leading to a high need for expert guidance.

  • Entrepreneurial Flexibility: Brokers enjoy the independence of running their own business, setting their hours, and building their clientele.

  • Income Potential: Earning is commission-based, creating a strong link between your effort and financial success.

  • Rewarding Work: Brokers play a crucial role in helping people achieve major goals like homeownership or business expansion.
targetAudiences: No special requirements. Course for any who want to build a career in mortgage and lending brokering

Do you want to start your first link-building campaign? Are you interested in increasing your online sales but afraid of going over budget? Do you want to reach new customers and increase sales?

This is an in-depth course to get started with link building.

In this link building course, we will walk through all the steps of launching effective links.

In this practical class, you will get a complete understanding of how to efficiently work with link building tactics and create successful campaigns to get loyal customers, increase traffic, and grow your business online.

Link building is an effective strategy to promote a website by placing backlinks on third-party resources. The goal of link building is to make your pages more "reliable and valid" in Google's eyes so that they rank higher and get more search traffic.

If you are not engaged in links, it does not mean that your site has none. Perhaps you have marketing services, such as content marketing or PR services, so the site will have links one way or another. If you're not in control of this process, one day it could cause trouble for you because you could get ranked in search, get penalized by Google for bad links, and not even know what's causing it. So, it's still important to understand how it works.

This course will teach you:

  • How link building works, its pros, and cons

courseDetails.title: Universidad Angular - De Cero a Experto - Angular 18
courseDetails.shortDescription: Actualizado - Domina Angular 18 y crea aplicaciones web del mundo real con TypeScript, Firebase, Firestore, JWT y más!
courseDetails.longDescription:
¡Ya somos más de 178,000 alumnos!. Tu curso de Universidad Angular comienza absolutamente desde Cero, y todo el código y guías en PDFs actualizadas a Angular 18, la versión más reciente de Angular.

¡No necesitas saber Angular! Tampoco necesitas tener conocimientos de ninguna tecnología, ya que en este curso te enseñaremos absolutamente todo lo que necesitas desde cero.

Estudiaremos desde la configuración hasta la implementación del framework de Angular, ¡Este curso lo cubre todo! Aprenderás todo sobre Componentes, Directivas, Servicios, Formularios, HTTP Access, Autenticación, Optimización de una aplicación Angular con módulos y mucho más, todo con ejemplos del mundo real.

¡Pero eso no es todo! ¡Este curso también te mostrará cómo usar el CLI de Angular y presentará un proyecto completo, que te permitá practicar todas las cosas aprendidas a lo largo del curso!

Angular es uno de los frameworks frontend más modernos, eficientes en rendimiento y potentes que puedas aprender. Te permitirá crear excelentes aplicaciones web que ofrecen increíbles experiencias de usuario. Aprende todos los fundamentos que necesita saber para comenzar a desarrollar aplicaciones Angular de inmediato.

Este curso utiliza TypeScript. TypeScript es el idioma principal utilizado por el equipo oficial de Angular y el idioma que verás principalmente en los tutoriales de Angular. Es un superconjunto de JavaScript y hace que escribir aplicaciones de Angular sea realmente fácil. Sin embargo, el conocimiento de TypeScript no es necesario, el conocimiento básico de JavaScript es suficiente. Además tendrás cursos de bono totalmente gratis para aprender HTML, CSS y JavaScript si aún no estás familiarizado con estas tecnologías. Así que este curso comienza absolutamente desde cero.

¿Por qué Angular?

Angular es el framework JavaScript de mayor crecimiento en los últimos años. Es el sucesor de Angular.js. Las potentes funciones y capacidades de Angular te permitirán crear aplicaciones web complejas, personalizables, modernas, receptivas y fáciles de usar.

Angular es más rápido que Angular 1 y ofrece un enfoque de desarrollo mucho más flexible y modular. Después de tomar este curso, podrás aprovechar por completo todas esas características y comenzar a desarrollar aplicaciones increíbles de inmediato.

Debido a las drásticas diferencias entre Angular 1 y Angular, no necesitas saber nada sobre Angular.js para poder beneficiarte de este curso y construir tus proyectos con Angular.

¡Este curso te enseñará todos los aspectos básicos sobre módulos, directivas, componentes, databindings, routing, uso de HTTP access y mucho más! En cada sección crearemos un proyecto real. En cada uno de los ejemplos mostraremos las características que ofrece Angular y cómo aplicarlas a proyectos del mundo real.

Específicamente aprenderás:

  • Arquitectura de Angular

  • TypeScript para escribir aplicaciones con Angular

  • Directivas y componentes

  • Cómo funciona databinding

  • Todo sobre enrutamiento (routing) y manejo de navegación.

  • Qué son los pipes y cómo usarlos

  • Cómo acceder a servicios web (por ejemplo, servidores RESTful)

  • Inyección de dependencias y cómo usarlo.

  • Creación y uso de módulos en Angular

  • Optimizar la aplicación Angular para producción

  • Conexión a Firebase y Firestore

  • Despliegue de una aplicación del mundo real a Internet

  • Al final crearemos un proyecto del mundo real

Por si fuera poco, te incluimos cursos de bono de regalo como son:

  • TypeScript (Lo esencial para aplicar este lenguaje con Angular)

  • HTML, CSS y JavaScript (Ideal para los que no cuentan con conocimientos de estas tecnologías aplicadas por Angular)

  • Fundamentos de JavaScript (Ideal para los que no tienen conocimientos de la programación con JavaScript)

¡Y mucho más!

Así que como puedes leer, este es el curso más completo de Angular en UDEMY, ya que te enseñaremos todas las tecnologías que usa Angular si no tienes este conocimiento, por lo que puedes estar seguro que puedes empezar absolutamente desde cero.

Sin más, te veo del otro lado.

Ing. Ubaldo Acosta

Fundador de Global Mentoring.

Experiencia y Conocimiento para tu Vida.

courseDetails.title: Estratégia e Desenvolvimento de Produtos
courseDetails.shortDescription: Diploma Profissional em Metodologias de Investigação em Estratégia e Desenvolvimento de Produtos pelo MTF Institute
courseDetails.longDescription:
Bem-vindo ao Curso: Diploma Profissional em Metodologias de Investigação em Estratégia e Desenvolvimento de Produtos pelo MTF Institute


Curso ministrado pelo MTF Institute of Management, Technology and Finance

O MTF é um instituto global de educação e investigação com sede em Lisboa, Portugal, focado na formação empresarial e profissional híbrida (presencial e online) nas áreas de: Negócios e Administração, Ciência e Tecnologia, Banca e Finanças.

O centro de I&D do MTF foca-se em atividades de investigação nas áreas de: Inteligência Artificial, Aprendizagem Automática ("Machine Learning"), Ciência de Dados, Big Data, WEB3, Blockchain, Criptomoedas e Ativos Digitais, Metaversos, Transformação Digital, Fintech, Comércio Eletrónico, e Internet das Coisas.

O MTF é parceiro oficial da: IBM, Intel, Microsoft, membro da Câmara Portuguesa de Comércio e Indústria.

O MTF está presente em 208 países e foi escolhido por mais de 420 000 alunos.


Autora do Curso:

Alex Amoroso é uma profissional experiente com uma sólida formação académica e empresarial, especializada em metodologias de investigação, formulação de estratégias, e desenvolvimento de produtos. Doutorada pela Faculdade de Ciências Sociais e Políticas de Lisboa, Portugal, onde foi Aprovada com Distinção e Louvor pela sua investigação exemplar, Alex Amoroso traz consigo um vasto conhecimento e experiência.

Para além dos seus estudos de doutoramento, a Doutora Amoroso tem atuado como Professora Convidada, ministrando cursos a uma vasta gama de estudantes desde a licenciatura até alunos de cursos profissionais e executivos. Atualmente, na EIMT em Zurique, Suíça, leciona para doutorandos, oferecendo instrução avançada em desenho e metodologias de investigação. No Instituto MTF, a Doutora Amoroso lidera a área académica de Desenvolvimento de Produto.

Em sinergia entre a experiência académica e empresarial, a Doutora Amoroso alcançou elevados resultados na sua carreira profissional, liderando atividades de I&D, desenvolvimento de produtos, desenvolvimento estratégico, e análise de mercado num vasto leque de empresas. Implementou as melhores práticas de mercado em setores que vão da Banca e Finanças, ao PropTech, Consultoria e Investigação, e Startups Inovadoras.

A extensa produção científica de Alex Amoroso inclui numerosos artigos publicados em revistas conceituadas, bem como apresentações orais e posters em conferências internacionais. Os resultados da sua investigação têm sido apresentados em instituições de renome como a Faculdade de Ciências Políticas e Sociais e a Stressed Out Conference na UCL, entre outras.

Com uma paixão pela colaboração interdisciplinar e um compromisso em impulsionar mudanças positivas, Alex Amoroso dedica-se a capacitar alunos e profissionais para a utilização de metodologias de vanguarda para alcançar a excelência no mundo empresarial global.


Objetivos do Curso:

● Dotar-vos de conhecimentos e competências para uma eficaz tomada de decisão

● Enfatizar a inovação centrada no ser humano e o conhecimento executável

● Abordagem multidisciplinar para a inovação e desenvolvimento de produtos


O que são Metodologias de Investigação em Estratégia e Desenvolvimento de Produtos?

As metodologias de investigação em estratégia e desenvolvimento de produtos são as abordagens e ferramentas estruturadas utilizadas para recolher, analisar e interpretar informação que apoia planos estratégicos e a criação de produtos. Garantem que as decisões estão enraizadas em provas e nas necessidades dos clientes, e não em suposições.


Principais Focos das Metodologias de Investigação em Estratégia e Desenvolvimento de Produtos

● Estudo de Mercado: Compreender a dimensão, tendências, concorrência e oportunidades dentro de um mercado ou indústria específica.

● Investigação de Clientes: Investigar as necessidades, pontos problemáticos, comportamentos e preferências do seu público-alvo.

● Análise da Concorrência: Avaliar os pontos fortes, fracos, estratégias e quota de mercado dos concorrentes.

● Análise de Tendências: Identificar padrões emergentes, tecnologias, ou preferências dos clientes que possam moldar o futuro.

● Análise Interna: Analisar os pontos fortes, fraquezas, capacidades e recursos de uma empresa para informar a estratégia.

● Teste de Conceito de Produto: Recolher feedback sobre ideias de produtos propostas numa fase inicial do processo de desenvolvimento.

● Teste de Usabilidade: Avaliar se um produto é fácil e intuitivo de usar.
targetAudiences: Sem requisitos especiais. Um curso para qualquer pessoa que queira construir uma carreira em Estratégia e Desenvolvimento de Produtos

Business leadership is the art of guiding an organization towards success. It involves setting a clear vision, inspiring employees, and making strategic decisions that propel the company forward. Effective leaders create a positive work environment where people feel motivated and empowered to contribute their best.


Core Functions of a Business Leader:

  • Visionary: Business leaders paint a picture of the future – the company's goals and aspirations. They articulate a compelling vision that excites and unites the team.

  • Strategic Decision-Making: Leaders make tough calls, weighing risks and opportunities to navigate the business towards its goals.

  • Motivator and Coach: They inspire and empower employees, helping them grow and develop their skills.

  • Effective Communicator: Leaders clearly communicate the vision, plans, and expectations to everyone in the organization.

  • Team Builder: They foster collaboration and build strong, cohesive teams that work effectively together.


Why Leadership Skills Matter for Your Career:

Developing leadership skills is crucial for career advancement. Here's why:

  • Increased Visibility: Leaders stand out. They take initiative, solve problems, and get things done, which grabs the attention of superiors.

  • Promotion Potential: Companies are always looking for strong leaders to fill management positions.

  • Stronger Teams: If you can lead and motivate others, you'll be a valuable asset on any team, making you a desirable candidate for projects and assignments.

  • Adaptability and Change: The business world is constantly evolving. Strong leadership skills equip you to adapt to change and navigate challenges.
targetAudiences: No special requirements. Course for any who want to build a career at business or improve their knowledge.

courseDetails.shortDescription: Java Mastery: Java + Spring Boot, Rest Web Services, MVC, Microservices + JDBC and SQL
courseDetails.longDescription:
Java Programming: From Basics to Advanced is a comprehensive course designed to provide students with a strong foundation in Java programming. The course covers a wide range of topics, starting from the importance of Java as a versatile and widely used programming language. Students will gain hands-on experience in setting up a Java development environment, writing their first Java program, and utilizing command line arguments.

The course then progresses to cover essential concepts such as basic programming constructs in Java, character sets, identifiers, variables, and constants. Students will learn about primitive data types, operators, and control statements, including if-else if statements, switch statements, jump statements, and looping statements. These fundamental concepts are crucial for building a solid understanding of Java programming.

The course further delves into more advanced topics, including arrays, object-oriented programming, packages, and exception handling. Students will learn how to efficiently work with arrays and use them to store and manipulate data. Object-oriented programming principles will be introduced, enabling students to create classes, objects, and methods to build modular and reusable code. They will also explore the benefits of using packages for organizing and managing code, as well as learn techniques for handling exceptions gracefully and ensuring program stability.


Course Highlights:

  • Importance of Java as a widely used programming language

  • Setting up a Java development environment

  • Writing the first Java program

  • Utilizing command line arguments

  • Understanding basic programming constructs in Java

  • Exploring character sets, identifiers, variables, and constants

  • Mastering primitive data types and operators

  • Implementing control statements: if-else if statements, switch statements, jump statements, and looping statements

  • Working with arrays for efficient data storage and manipulation

  • Embracing object-oriented programming concepts

  • Creating classes, objects, and methods for modular and reusable code

  • Organizing code using packages

  • Handling exceptions effectively to ensure program stability
targetAudiences: Desire to Learn and make a carrier in Java programming

courseDetails.title: Certificado Profissional em Gestão de Projetos
courseDetails.shortDescription: Compreender a Gestão de Projetos, Funções Principais, Papel de um Gestor de Projeto, Project Lifecycle, Metodologia
courseDetails.longDescription:
Bem-vindo ao Curso: Certificado Profissional em Liderança e Gestão


Curso ministrado pelo MTF Institute of Management, Technology and Finance.  

O MTF é um instituto global de educação e investigação, com sede em Lisboa, Portugal, focado na formação empresarial e profissional híbrida (presencial e online) nas áreas de: Negócios e Administração, Ciência e Tecnologia, Banca e Finanças.

O centro de I&D do MTF foca-se em atividades de investigação nas áreas de: Inteligência Artificial, Aprendizagem Automática (Machine Learning), Ciência de Dados, Big Data, WEB3, Blockchain, Criptomoedas e Ativos Digitais, Metaversos, Transformação Digital, Fintech, Comércio Eletrónico e Internet das Coisas.

O MTF é parceiro oficial da IBM, Intel e Microsoft, e membro da Câmara de Comércio e Indústria Portuguesa.

O MTF está presente em 213 países e foi escolhido por mais de 560 000 alunos.


Autor do curso:

Ana Cristina M. B. Saraiva é uma profissional distinta com uma sólida combinação de experiência académica e empresarial, especializada em gestão, ética, desenvolvimento estratégico e liderança. Obteve o Doutoramento em Gestão pela Universidade Lusíada de Lisboa, onde se destacou nas áreas de gestão empresarial, e-commerce, análise crítica de modelos de gestão e metodologias de investigação avançadas, recebendo grande reconhecimento pelas suas contribuições na área.

Atualmente, exerce funções como Gestora de Projetos na Associação Portuguesa de Ética Empresarial (APEE). Este papel sublinha o seu compromisso com a promoção da inovação ética e da sustentabilidade nas organizações e nos setores público e privado.

Relativamente à sua área académica, Ana Saraiva fez contribuições significativas como consultora e investigadora no centro de investigação COMEGI da Universidade Lusíada. Colaborou com prestigiadas instituições nacionais e internacionais, incluindo o IST (Universidade de Lisboa) e várias universidades europeias, avançando na investigação e implementando soluções inovadoras nas práticas de gestão organizacionais. A sua experiência editorial inclui a gestão e indexação de revistas científicas em plataformas como Scopus, DOAJ e outras de prestígio, refletindo a sua dedicação nos elevados padrões académicos.

Com uma experiência empresarial de mais de uma década, Ana trabalhou na hotelaria de luxo, onde liderou esforços na coordenação de eventos, na garantia de qualidade e na satisfação dos hóspedes. Possui um histórico comprovado de melhoria da excelência operacional e gestão estratégica, sendo uma líder versátil e capaz de impulsionar resultados nos mais diversificados contextos.

A produção académica de Ana Saraiva é vasta, incluindo numerosos artigos revistos por pares e apresentações em conferências que abordam questões críticas em gestão, ética e transformação digital. É proficiente numa ampla gama de ferramentas e plataformas digitais, como SPSS, SAS e NVivo, utilizadas para otimizar os resultados de investigação e de negócios.

Com uma paixão pela colaboração interdisciplinar e um compromisso com práticas éticas e sustentáveis, Ana Cristina M. B. Saraiva dedica-se a capacitar organizações e indivíduos para alcançar a excelência através de soluções inovadoras e liderança responsável no panorama global dos negócios.


O que é Gestão de Projetos?

Gestão de projetos é a aplicação organizada de conhecimentos, processos, habilidades e ferramentas para guiar um projeto desde o seu início até a sua conclusão bem-sucedida. Envolve:

  • Definir metas: Decidir o que o projeto deve alcançar.

  • Planejamento: Mapear as etapas e os recursos necessários.

  • Execução: Colocar o plano em ação, direcionar a equipe e gerenciar os recursos.

  • Monitoramento e controle: Acompanhar o progresso, gerenciar mudanças e resolver problemas.

  • Encerramento: Revisar o projeto, documentar os resultados e aprender com a experiência.


O que é Gestão de Projetos de Negócios?

A gestão de projetos de negócios refere-se à aplicação de princípios de gestão de projetos em um ambiente de negócios. Esses projetos se concentram em alcançar objetivos de negócios, como:

  • Lançamento de novos produtos ou serviços

  • Melhorar ou automatizar processos de negócios

  • Reestruturar departamentos

  • Implementar novos sistemas de software


O Papel da Gestão de Projetos

A gestão de projetos desempenha um papel fundamental nas empresas porque:

  • Aumenta a Eficiência: Um plano de projeto bem definido ajuda a otimizar o trabalho e evitar o desperdício de esforço.

  • Garante Resultados: A gestão de projetos mantém o foco em cumprir as metas definidas dentro das restrições de tempo e orçamento.

  • Gerencia Riscos: Problemas potenciais são antecipados e mitigados por meio de planejamento e monitoramento cuidadosos.

  • Melhora a Comunicação: Canais de comunicação claros entre membros da equipe, stakeholders e clientes ajudam a evitar mal-entendidos.

  • Melhora a Satisfação do Cliente: A conclusão bem-sucedida do projeto dentro dos parâmetros acordados gera confiança com os clientes.


Por que aprender gestão de projetos é importante para as empresas?

As empresas investem no treinamento de gestão de projetos de seus funcionários porque:

  • Vantagem Competitiva: Empresas com fortes capacidades de gestão de projetos entregam projetos com mais sucesso, ganham reputação de confiabilidade e superam os concorrentes.

  • Reduz Custos: Projetos ineficientes custam mais devido a atrasos e desperdício de recursos. A gestão de projetos ajuda a otimizar os recursos.

  • Melhora o Moral dos Funcionários: Projetos bem administrados minimizam o estresse, melhoram a colaboração da equipe e criam um senso de realização.

  • Melhora a Inovação: A gestão de projetos estruturada permite gerenciar projetos de inovação, levando a uma cultura de inovação dentro da empresa.


Como as habilidades de gerenciamento de projetos impulsionam sua carreira

Desenvolver suas habilidades de gerenciamento de projetos pode melhorar significativamente suas perspectivas de carreira:

  • Alta Demanda: Gerentes de projeto são procurados em todos os setores, como TI, construção, saúde, etc.

  • Melhor Salário: Gerentes de projeto qualificados geralmente ganham salários mais altos devido à sua experiência.

  • Potencial de Liderança: A gestão de projetos fornece uma base sólida para assumir funções de liderança dentro das organizações.

  • Versatilidade: As habilidades de gerenciamento de projetos se aplicam a uma ampla gama de empregos e funções, não apenas a cargos de gerenciamento de projetos.

  • Crescimento Pessoal: Você desenvolverá habilidades organizacionais, de resolução de problemas e de comunicação, tornando-se um trunfo para qualquer equipe.
targetAudiences: Sem requisitos especiais. Um curso para qualquer pessoa que queira construir uma carreira em Gestão

Step two: target audience analysis. By completing this block, you will have a portrait of your target audience, including their demographics, and psychographic characteristics, as well as their needs and pain points, which will help you identify triggers that influence purchasing decisions.

courseDetails.title: Tally Prime Basic to Advance with GST, Payroll, TDS & more
courseDetails.shortDescription: Beginner friendly, Basic to Advanced Tally Prime. Maintain Accounts of Any Business with Confidence with GST & Payroll
courseDetails.longDescription:
The Tally Prime Fundamentals course is designed to provide students with a comprehensive understanding of Tally Prime software and its practical application in managing financial transactions and accounting processes. Tally Prime is a popular and widely used accounting software solution that simplifies various accounting tasks for businesses of all sizes.

This course will cover the essential features of Tally Prime, starting with the installation process, followed by creating a company and setting up the chart of accounts. Participants will learn how to record day-to-day transactions, perform banking operations, and generate essential financial reports using Tally Prime.


Course Objectives:

  1. Familiarize participants with the Tally Prime software interface and its key components.

  2. Understand the installation process and system requirements for Tally Prime.

  3. Learn how to create a new company in Tally Prime and configure company settings.

  4. Gain proficiency in setting up the chart of accounts, including ledgers, groups, and cost centers.

  5. Develop skills in recording various types of transactions, such as sales, purchases, payments, and receipts.

  6. Explore the banking features in Tally Prime, including bank reconciliation and fund transfers.


Course Outline:

  1. Introduction to Tally Prime

    • Overview of Tally Prime software and its benefits

    • Understanding the user interface and navigation

  2. Installation and Company Setup

    • System requirements and software installation

    • Creating a new company and configuring company settings

  3. Chart of Accounts

    • Creating ledgers, groups, and cost centers

    • Defining account classifications and hierarchies

  4. Recording Day-to-Day Transactions

    • Entering sales and purchase transactions

    • Managing cash and bank transactions

    • Handling journal entries and adjusting entries

  5. Banking in Tally Prime

    • Explain how to record bank transactions, reconcile bank statements, and manage your bank accounts using Tally Prime.

  6. Generating Financial Statements:

    • Provide instructions on how to generate financial statements like profit and loss statements, balance sheets, and cash flow statements in Tally Prime.

  7. Data Security:

    • Discuss best practices for securing your Tally Prime data, including user access control, data backup, and password protection.

  8. Storage and Classification of Inventory:

    • Explain how to manage your inventory in Tally Prime, including how to classify items, record stock movements, and perform stock valuation.

  9. Accounts Receivable and Payable Management:

    • Detail how to track and manage accounts receivable (money owed to you) and accounts payable (money you owe to others) in Tally Prime.

  10. Purchase and Sales Order Processing:

    • Describe the process of creating and managing purchase and sales orders within Tally Prime.

  11. Price Level and Price Lists:

    • Explain how to set up and use price levels and price lists to manage product pricing in Tally Prime.

  12. Manufacturing Process:

    • If applicable, provide information on how to manage manufacturing processes and inventory in Tally Prime.

  13. Tracking Additional Cost of Purchase:

    • Describe how to track additional costs associated with purchases, such as taxes, shipping, and handling fees.

  14. Cost and Profit Center Management:

    • Explain how to set up and manage cost centers and profit centers to analyze financial performance.

  15. Budgets and Scenarios:

    • Discuss how to create budgets and scenarios in Tally Prime for better financial planning and analysis.

  16. Generating and Printing Reports:

    • Provide guidance on generating and customizing various reports in Tally Prime for better decision-making.

  17. GST Details - HSN Codes - Intrastate and Interstate GST in Tally Prime:

    • Explain how to manage Goods and Services Tax (GST) details, including HSN codes, and how to handle intrastate and interstate GST transactions.

  18. Tax Deducted at Source (Income Tax) and Tax Collected at Source (TCS):

    • Describe how to handle TDS and TCS deductions and compliance in Tally Prime.

  19. Job Costing and Job Work:

    • If relevant, explain how to use Tally Prime for job costing and job work management.

  20. Advanced GST in Tally Prime Theory:

    • Cover advanced GST concepts, such as reverse charge mechanism and e-way bills.

  21. Advance TDS and Payroll Management in Tally Prime:

    • Detail advanced TDS concepts and how to manage payroll in Tally Prime.
targetAudiences: Beginner Tally prime learner

courseDetails.title: دليل شامل لكشف سر النجاح في البزنس؟

  • تحديد الأهداف وبناء الرؤية
    تعلم كيفية تحديد أهداف واضحة وقابلة للتحقيق وكيفية بناء رؤية شاملة لمستقبلك في مجال الأعمال. سنقدم أدوات وتقنيات تساعدك على تحديد مسارك المهني بدقة وثقة.

  • تطوير المرونة والقدرة على التحمل
    استكشف استراتيجيات تعزيز المرونة النفسية والقدرة على التحمل لمواجهة التحديات والصعوبات في عالم الأعمال. سنتناول كيفية تحويل الفشل إلى فرص للتعلم والنمو.

  • إدارة الوقت وزيادة الإنتاجية
    اكتشف أفضل الممارسات لإدارة الوقت بكفاءة وزيادة إنتاجيتك. ستتعلم كيفية تنظيم مهامك اليومية وتحقيق توازن بين حياتك المهنية والشخصية.

  • تعزيز التفكير الإبداعي وحل المشكلات
    تعلم تقنيات التفكير الإبداعي وكيفية تطبيقها في حل المشكلات وتجاوز التحديات. سنقدم أدوات عملية تساعدك على ابتكار حلول مبتكرة ودائمة.

  • بناء العلاقات والتواصل الفعّال
    افهم أهمية بناء علاقات قوية وشبكة دعم في مجال الأعمال. سنتناول مهارات التواصل الفعّال وكيفية التأثير على الآخرين بإيجابية.

منهجية الدورة:

  • محاضرات تفاعلية

  • ورش عمل عملية

  • دراسات حالة واقعية

  • نقاشات جماعية

  • أنشطة تطبيقية

الفئة المستهدفة:

  • رواد الأعمال

  • المدراء التنفيذيين

Customer Centricity is a business philosophy that puts the customer at the heart of every decision. It's about understanding their needs, wants, and motivations, and then using that information to create products, services, and experiences that delight them.

Design Thinking is a human-centered problem-solving process that helps you develop solutions that are not only feasible but also desirable. It's a iterative approach that involves understanding the problem, brainstorming solutions, prototyping, testing, and refining.


Key Focuses:

  • Empathy: Both customer centricity and design thinking require a deep understanding of the people you're designing for. This means putting yourself in their shoes and seeing the world from their perspective.

  • Iteration: Neither process is linear. You'll learn as you go and need to be prepared to adapt your ideas based on new information.

  • Testing: It's crucial to test your ideas with real customers to see how they respond. This helps ensure that you're creating something that people actually want and need.


Why They're Important:

For Companies:

  • Increased Customer Satisfaction and Loyalty: By focusing on what customers want, you're more likely to create products and services that they'll love. This leads to higher satisfaction, loyalty, and repeat business.

  • Improved Innovation: Customer centricity and design thinking can help companies develop new products and services that are more likely to be successful.

  • Reduced Costs: Understanding customer needs upfront can help avoid costly mistakes down the road.


For Careers:

  • In-Demand Skills: The ability to think creatively and solve problems from a customer's perspective is highly sought after by employers.

  • Increased Marketability: These skills can help you stand out from the competition and land your dream job.

  • Better Problem-Solving: You'll develop a more holistic approach to problem-solving that considers not just the technical feasibility of a solution but also its desirability and usability.
targetAudiences: No special requirements. A course for anyone who wants to build career in Strategy and Product Development

courseDetails.shortDescription: Navigating the Crypto Universe Course by MTF Institute
courseDetails.longDescription:
Welcome to course: Navigating the Crypto Universe Course by MTF Institute


Course provided by MTF Institute of Management, Technology and Finance and Quppy

MTF is the global educational and research institute with HQ at Lisbon, Portugal, focused on business & professional hybrid (on-campus and online) education at areas: Business & Administration, Science & Technology, Banking & Finance.

MTF is present in 208 countries and has been chosen by more than 400 000 students.


Quppy

Pay, save, exchange & transfer crypto and fiat — in one place

Quppy Crypto Wallet allows you to stay on top of money without any loss. Use Quppy to:

  • Connect your existing wallets or open a new Quppy wallet

  • Convert funds between digital and fiat and manage your money in multiple currencies

  • Operate with USDT, BTC, BCH, LTC, ETH and TRX

  • Top up your account with any bank card


Quppy's main objective

is to provide complete banking and financial services within a single app. As a result, our clients will bring all their cards and accounts together within the Quppy interface. Today, we offer a constantly evolving application that includes a digital wallet, a multi-currency IBAN account, and more.


Crypto Universe

  • The Basics: The Crypto Universe refers to the entire ecosystem built around cryptocurrencies and blockchain technology. Cryptocurrencies are digital or virtual currencies that use encryption (secure coding) for transactions. Blockchain is the decentralized digital ledger technology that records and verifies all those transactions in a secure, transparent manner.

  • Key Elements:

    • Cryptocurrencies: Bitcoin, Ethereum, Dogecoin, and thousands more.

    • Exchanges: Online platforms to buy, sell, and trade cryptocurrencies (e.g., Coinbase, Binance).

    • Blockchain Networks: The underlying infrastructure different cryptocurrencies run on (e.g., Ethereum network, Solana network).

    • Decentralized Applications (dApps): Services and apps built on blockchain technology, offering financial tools, games, and more.

    • Non-Fungible Tokens (NFTs): Unique, non-replaceable digital assets linked to artwork, music, etc.


Crypto Wallets

  • Your Digital Vault: Crypto wallets are software programs or physical devices that store your private keys. These keys grant you access to your crypto assets held on the blockchain.

  • Types of Wallets:

    • Hot Wallets: Software wallets connected to the internet (e.g., mobile apps, browser extensions). More convenient, but potentially slightly less secure.

    • Cold Wallets: Hardware devices that store keys offline. Enhanced security, but less convenient for frequent transactions.

    • Custodial Wallets: Managed by a third party, like a cryptocurrency exchange. Easier to use, but you don't directly control your private keys.

    • Non-custodial Wallets: You have complete control of your keys. Offers more autonomy but more responsibility.


Crypto and Financial Literacy

Learning about crypto and blockchain offers several ways to boost your financial literacy:

  • New Investment Opportunities: Cryptocurrencies present a new asset class with potential for gains (and losses!). Understanding the risks, market trends, and different coins helps you make informed investment decisions.

  • Understanding Decentralization: Crypto highlights the concept of decentralized finance (DeFi), where financial services aren't controlled by central banks or institutions. This knowledge gives insights into alternative financial systems.

  • Technological Innovation: Blockchain technology has wide-ranging applications beyond finance. Learning about it helps you grasp cutting-edge technology shaping the future economy.

  • Critical Thinking About Money: The volatile nature of crypto markets underscores the importance of risk assessment, diversification, and responsible financial planning.

  • Spotting Scams: The crypto space, unfortunately, attracts scams. Understanding common scams and how wallets and security work helps you safeguard your assets.
targetAudiences: No special requirements. Course for any who want to understand Crypto Finances

What is Product Management?

Product Management is a multifaceted discipline that encompasses the planning, development, marketing, and optimization of a product or service throughout its lifecycle. It involves aligning customer needs with business goals and coordinating cross-functional teams to deliver successful and valuable products. Product managers act as the linchpin between various departments, ensuring seamless communication and collaboration.


Why is Learning Product Management Important for Companies and Experts?

  1. Market Relevance and Competitiveness:

    • In an era of rapid technological advancements and evolving consumer preferences, companies must stay relevant. Product management equips professionals with the skills to identify market trends, understand customer needs, and develop products that outpace competitors

  2. Customer-Centric Approach:

    • Successful products are those that solve real problems for customers. Product management emphasizes a customer-centric approach, ensuring that the product aligns with user needs and expectations. This focus enhances customer satisfaction and loyalty

  3. Optimized Resource Allocation:

    • Product managers are adept at prioritizing features and functionalities based on business goals and customer needs. This strategic allocation of resources ensures that the most critical aspects of a product are addressed, maximizing the impact of limited resources

  4. Effective Communication and Collaboration:

    • Product managers act as bridges between various departments, fostering effective communication and collaboration. This ensures that development, marketing, sales, and other teams work cohesively toward a common goal, reducing silos and enhancing overall efficiency

  5. Adaptability and Innovation:

    • The product management discipline encourages a mindset of continuous improvement and innovation. Professionals in this field are equipped to adapt to changing market conditions, incorporate feedback, and drive iterative development, fostering a culture of innovation within the organization

How Knowledge of Product Management Aids Career Development:

  1. Cross-Functional Skillset:

    • Product management requires a diverse skill set that includes market research, strategic planning, communication, and project management. Professionals with expertise in these areas are highly sought after, making product management a versatile career path

  2. Leadership Opportunities:

    • Product managers often take on leadership roles, overseeing teams and guiding product development strategies. The ability to lead cross-functional teams and drive product success positions individuals for advancement in their careers

  3. Entrepreneurial Mindset:

    • Product managers are often viewed as the "CEOs of their products." Learning product management instills an entrepreneurial mindset, empowering individuals to take ownership of their projects and make strategic decisions that impact the success of the product

  4. Global Perspective:

    • As products have a global reach, product managers gain exposure to international markets and diverse customer bases. This global perspective enhances their ability to navigate the complexities of the modern business landscape

Product management is a critical discipline for companies aiming to thrive in today's dynamic markets. For professionals, mastering product management opens doors to leadership roles, cultivates an entrepreneurial mindset, and provides a comprehensive skill set that is invaluable in the ever-evolving business landscape.
targetAudiences: No special requirements. Course for any who want to build a career at Product Management or improve their knowledge.

courseDetails.title: PowerShell Regular Expressions: Regex Master Class
courseDetails.shortDescription: Learn All About PowerShell Regular Expressions and use PowerShell Regex like experts
courseDetails.longDescription:
If You want to Master PowerShell Regular Expressions (Regex), Then this course is for you.

If your want to unlock the power of regular expressions? Look no further! In this course, we dive into the fascinating world of regex and explore how it can supercharge your PowerShell scripting.

In this Course, you will learn:

  • Fundamentals of regular expressions: Understand the syntax, metacharacters, and quantifiers used in regex patterns.

  • Pattern matching techniques: Learn how to construct regex patterns to match specific text patterns, including literal strings, character classes, and anchors.

  • Capturing and grouping: Explore advanced regex features such as capturing groups and backreferences to extract and manipulate data from complex text strings.

  • Regex in PowerShell scripting: Integrate regular expressions seamlessly into your PowerShell scripts to automate text processing tasks, file manipulation, and data extraction.

  • Best practices and optimization: Discover tips and techniques for writing efficient and maintainable regex patterns, avoiding common pitfalls, and optimizing performance.

By the end of this course, you'll have the skills and confidence to wield regular expressions like a seasoned PowerShell pro, enabling you to tackle a wide range of text processing challenges with ease and efficiency. Whether you're parsing log files, extracting information from documents, or transforming text data, mastering PowerShell regular expressions will empower you to take your automation capabilities to the next level.
targetAudiences: Learners who want to learn PowerShell Regular Expressions to make efficient PowerShell Scripts and want to make their professional life easy

courseDetails.title: Web Hacking For Beginners
courseDetails.shortDescription: Unlocking the Secrets of Web Security for Beginners.
courseDetails.longDescription:
Welcome to "Web Hacking For Beginners"! In this course, we'll explore the exciting world of web security and learn how to protect websites from potential threats. Whether you're completely new to cybersecurity or have some experience, this course is designed for you.

We'll start by understanding how hackers gather information about websites using techniques like Google Dorking and fingerprinting web servers. Then, we'll dive into testing the setup of web applications and learn about different HTTP methods.

Next, we'll explore techniques for finding usernames on websites and testing how secure their authentication systems are. We'll also look at ways to bypass access controls and test input validation to ensure websites are protected from common vulnerabilities.

Finally, we'll delve into client-side security and learn about issues like Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) attacks, which can compromise user data.

Throughout the course, you'll get hands-on experience with practical exercises and real-world examples. By the end, you'll have the knowledge and skills to identify and fix security issues in web applications.

Join us on this journey to become a web security expert! Whether you're interested in cybersecurity as a career or just want to learn something new, this course is for you. Let's get started and make the web a safer place for everyone!
targetAudiences: Aspiring Ethical Hackers.

courseDetails.title: 3Bedrom Bungalow SketchUp from basic to advance Free version
courseDetails.shortDescription: 3Bedroom bungalow 3D SketchUp pro design from basic to advance level, (Free version)
courseDetails.longDescription:
If you're looking to design 3D models using SketchUp and you're interested in learning from basic to advanced levels, here’s a guide tailored for the free version of SketchUp:

Getting Started with SketchUp Free

  1. Introduction to SketchUp Free

    • What is SketchUp Free? It’s a browser-based version of SketchUp that’s accessible without cost. It’s ideal for basic 3D modeling tasks.

    • Basic Tools and Features

      • Navigate the Interface: Learn how to use the toolbar, the drawing area, and the default panels.

      • Basic Drawing: Start with basic shapes like rectangles, circles, and lines.

      • Push/Pull Tool: This tool helps you extrude 2D shapes into 3D models.

      • Move, Rotate, and Scale: Understand how to manipulate objects within your model.

    • Creating Simple Models

      • Build a Basic Object: Practice creating simple objects like a chair or table.

      • Group and Component: Learn to group objects to manage them easily and use components to reuse elements.

    Intermediate Skills

    1. Detailed Modeling

      • Precision Drawing: Use guidelines and inferencing to create accurate models.

      • Layers and Tags: Organize your model using layers (now called tags) for better management.

      • Textures and Materials: Apply textures and colors to your models for a more realistic look.

    2. Advanced Tools

      • Follow Me Tool: Create complex shapes by extruding a profile along a path.

      • Intersect Faces: Use this tool to create detailed cuts and intersections in your model.

      • Scale Tool: Learn advanced scaling techniques for fine-tuning your models.

    3. Component and Model Libraries

      • Using 3D Warehouse: Access and integrate models from SketchUp’s 3D Warehouse into your projects.

      • Creating Custom Components: Design and save your own components for reuse.

    Advanced Techniques

    1. Complex Geometry

      • Advanced Shapes: Model intricate geometry and complex structures.

      • Sculpting: Use tools to refine and sculpt your model for detailed designs.

    2. Rendering and Presentation

      • Styles and Shadows: Apply different styles and shadows to enhance the visual appeal of your models.
targetAudiences: This course is for everyone who want to become 3D building designer
Also Architects

The Chief Executive Officer (CEO) is a pivotal leadership role within an organization, responsible for steering the company towards its strategic goals and ensuring its overall success. The CEO serves as the highest-ranking executive and is accountable for the overall performance, direction, and decision-making of the company. The role encompasses a diverse set of responsibilities, and a CEO is expected to wear multiple hats to effectively lead and manage the organization.


Key aspects of the CEO role include:


Strategic Vision and Planning: The CEO is responsible for developing and communicating a clear vision for the company. They must also formulate and execute strategic plans that align with the organization's mission and objectives.


Leadership and Decision-Making: CEOs provide leadership to the executive team and the entire organization. They make crucial decisions that impact the company's direction, growth, and overall performance.


Stakeholder Management: CEOs must effectively engage with various stakeholders, including investors, customers, employees, and the board of directors. Building and maintaining positive relationships with these stakeholders is crucial for the company's success.


Risk Management: CEOs are tasked with identifying and mitigating risks that could impact the organization. This includes overseeing financial management, regulatory compliance, and other aspects that contribute to the company's stability.


Innovation and Adaptability: CEOs must foster a culture of innovation within the organization and be adaptable to changes in the business environment. They play a crucial role in ensuring the company remains competitive and responsive to market dynamics.


Corporate Governance: CEOs are responsible for upholding ethical standards and ensuring compliance with legal and regulatory requirements. They work closely with the board of directors to maintain effective corporate governance.


For employers and managers, understanding the CEO role is essential for several reasons:


Strategic Alignment: Employees at all levels need to understand how their work contributes to the overall strategic objectives of the company. Knowledge of the CEO's role helps align individual and team efforts with the organization's vision.


Decision-Making Perspective: Managers can benefit from understanding the decision-making processes of CEOs. This knowledge can enhance their own decision-making skills and enable them to contribute more effectively to the organization.


Leadership Development: Aspiring leaders can learn from the CEO's leadership style and strategies. Studying the CEO role provides valuable insights into the qualities and skills required to lead an organization successfully


Career Advancement: Employees with a comprehensive understanding of the CEO role are better equipped to advance their careers. They can position themselves as strategic thinkers and leaders, making them valuable assets to the organization.


For those aspiring to become future CEOs, acquiring knowledge about the CEO role is crucial for building a successful career.


This includes:


Leadership Skills Development: Learning from the experiences and approaches of successful CEOs helps in honing leadership skills. This includes the ability to inspire and motivate teams, make tough decisions, and navigate complex challenges.


Strategic Thinking: Future CEOs must develop a strategic mindset, understanding how to set long-term goals, analyze market trends, and make decisions that position the company for sustainable growth.


Communication and Stakeholder Management: Effective communication with various stakeholders is a critical aspect of the CEO role. Developing strong communication and relationship-building skills is essential for future leaders


Financial Acumen: CEOs are responsible for the financial health of the organization. Building financial literacy and understanding key financial metrics is crucial for making informed decisions and ensuring the company's success.


Adaptability and Resilience: The business landscape is dynamic, and CEOs must navigate uncertainties and challenges. Future CEOs should cultivate adaptability and resilience to thrive in ever-changing environments.


Understanding the role of a CEO is essential for both current managers and aspiring leaders. It provides valuable insights into effective leadership, strategic decision-making, and the overall dynamics of running a successful organization. This knowledge not only contributes to individual career development but also enhances the overall performance and success of the company.
targetAudiences: No special requirements. Course for any who want to build a career as CEO or improve their knowledge.

courseDetails.title: Elementor Kits: Crea una Página Web con Elementor Pro 2024
courseDetails.shortDescription: Aprende a cómo crear una página web con WordPress, Elementor Kits y Elementor Pro, sin saber de programación.
courseDetails.longDescription:
¿DESEAS CREAR UNA PÁGINA WEB CON WORPDRESS, ELEMENTOR KITS Y ELEMENTOR PRO?


WordPress es un software gratuito o herramienta de gestión de contenidos, también llamado CMS (Content Management System), diseñada para crear y mantener fácilmente un Blog, un sitio Web o una Tienda Online.


WordPress es sin duda alguna, el mejor gestor de contenidos del mundo, y el más utilizado con diferencia, llegando actualmente a superar el 58% de cuota de mercado. Además es de código abierto y completamente gratuito.


Elementor es un plugin gratuito para WordPress que sirve para crear y maquetar páginas web con todo tipo de diseños a través de un editor visual de tipo drag and drop que permite arrastrar y añadir elementos de manera sencilla y rápida, simplifica de manera extraordinaria el diseño de páginas web con WordPress, sobre todo para personas que no son expertas en código y programación web y quieren crear sitios desde cero sin las limitaciones del constructor nativo de WordPress.


Además, Elementor posee una interfaz intuitiva y muy visual que permite trabajar a tiempo real sobre el frontend, es decir, sobre el diseño de la página en la parte visual.


Elementor Pro es la versión de pago del plugin Elementor. Esta versión pagada incorpora widgets, plantillas, el editor de temas además de un soporte premium para resolver dudas y solucionar problemas.


Los kits de plantillas de Elementor son plantillas de páginas disponibles como colecciones, centradas en un tema o tipo de sitio web específico. Los kits de plantillas se crean como un grupo de plantillas individuales para un sitio web específico.


Los creadores de sitios pueden utilizar kits de plantillas para páginas individuales de un sitio. Por ejemplo, un kit de plantillas de sitio web inmobiliario comprende plantillas para cada página que una empresa inmobiliaria convencional necesita y plantillas para componentes específicos, a saber, formularios de contacto , ventanas emergentes , pies de página, encabezados, etc.

Nuestro curso es 100% práctico, lo guiaremos a través de diversos pasos y juntos crearemos su sitio web con WordPress, Elementor Kits y Elementor Pro, de modo que al finalizar nuestro curso, tendrá su sitio web diseñado con su personalización y a su gusto.

¿QUÉ APRENDERÁS EN NUESTRO CURSO?

  • Cómo contratar un plan de hosting para crear tu sitio web con WordPress, Elementor Kits y Elementor Pro.

  • Cómo crear sitios web profesionales con WordPress, Elementor Kits y Elementor Pro.

  • Cómo instalar plantillas prediseñadas con Elementor Kits para comenzar a crear tu sitio web con WordPress y Elementor Pro.

  • Cómo personalizar el diseño de tu sitio web de forma profesional con el constructor visual de Elementor.

courseDetails.title: Universidad de Programación - Python, Java, C y C++ - 2024
courseDetails.shortDescription: Aprende Python, Java, C y C++ desde Cero con Proyectos Reales. Tkinter, Flask, Spring, PrimeFaces, Swing, React y Mysql
courseDetails.longDescription:
Nuevo Curso: Universidad de Programación - Edición 2024.

De Principiante a Experto  en Python, Java, C y C++.

¿Sientes que has perdido oportunidades por no saber programar?

Es hora de cambiar tu historia y tener éxito en el mundo de la programación con Python, Java, C y C++. Miles de nuestros alumnos han transformado sus vidas con este conocimiento, y tú puedes ser el próximo.

Únete a nuestra comunidad con más de medio millón de estudiantes en Udemy y elimina tus miedos e inseguridades al momento de programar.

En este curso integral, aprenderás desde los fundamentos hasta los aspectos más avanzados de Python, Java, C y C++. Con proyectos del mundo real y las tecnologías más utilizadas hoy en día, te convertirás en un desarrollador versátil y competente.

Lo que aprenderás:

  1. Introducción y Configuración:

    • Instalación y configuración de las herramientas necesarias.

    • Conceptos básicos de cada lenguaje.

  2. Fundamentos de Programación:

    • Variables, operadores y sentencias de decisión (if, else).

    • Manejo de ciclos (for, while) en Python, Java, C y C++.

  3. Estructuras de Datos:

    • Tuplas y listas en Python.

    • Arreglos y matrices en Java, C y C++.

  4. Funciones y Procedimientos:

    • Definición y uso de funciones en cada lenguaje.

    • Parámetros y retorno de valores.

  5. Programación Orientada a Objetos (POO):

    • Conceptos de clases, objetos, herencia y polimorfismo en Python y Java

    • Aplicaciones avanzadas en Python y Java.

  6. Desarrollo de Aplicaciones del Mundo Real en Python y Java:

    • Manejo de archivos y conexión a bases de datos con MySQL.

    • Creación de proyectos con arquitectura multicapa moderna.

  7. Desarrollo de Interfaces Gráficas en Python y Java:

    • Aplicaciones de escritorio con Tkinter en Python y Swing en Java.

    • Integración de Spring y Spring Boot en proyectos Java.

  8. Desarrollo Web en Python y Java:

    • Creación de aplicaciones web con Flask, HTML, CSS, Bootstrap y MySQL en Python.

    • Desarrollo web con Java Empresarial usando JSF, PrimeFaces y Spring Boot.

Proyectos Java Especiales Incluidos:

  • Sistema de Tareas con JavaFX y Spring Boot.

  • Sistema de Empleados con JSPs y Spring Boot.

  • Sistema de Tareas con Thymeleaf y Spring Boot.

  • Sistema de Recursos Humanos FullStack con React JS y Spring Boot.

  • Sistema de Inventarios FullStack con Angular y Spring Boot.

¿Por qué confiar en nosotros? Somos el Ing. Ubaldo Acosta y la Ing. Marcela Gamiño, con más de 20 años de experiencia laboral y más de 14 años enseñando en línea. Hemos creado los cursos más populares en Udemy, como 'Universidad Java' y 'Universidad Python', que son Best Sellers.

Este curso es altamente práctico, con múltiples ejercicios y proyectos reales. Aprenderás aplicando las mejores prácticas de desarrollo de software y diversos patrones de diseño, lo que te ayudará a resolver problemas de manera eficiente.

Es hora de transformar tu futuro y dominar la programación con Python, Java, C y C++. Inscríbete ya mismo y comienza tu viaje hacia el éxito.

Nos vemos dentro del curso.

Saludos,

Ing. Ubaldo Acosta e Ing. Marcela Gamiño

Fundadores de Global Mentoring

“La educación es el arma más poderosa que puedes usar para cambiar el mundo.”
targetAudiences: A gente interesada en aprender Python, Java, C y C++ en el menor tiempo posible
No se requiere ningún conocimiento previo ni ningún estudio previo

Cualquier persona que desee aprender a programar con Python, Java, C y C++ puede estudiar este curso, pensado exclusivamente para principiantes y que al finalizar quieran sentirse cómodos y confiados usando Pytho, Java, C y C++
